Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering      Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    CE Major    EE Major    EP Major    Courses    Internships and Jobs    Minors    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Graduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Courses    MS Program    PhD Program    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           Research Areas    Featured Research    Labs    Research Experiences for Undergraduates    Sponsors         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Faculty    Emeritus Faculty    Adjunct Faculty    Professional Organizations    Resources    Staff    Open Positions         News    Events     Eyebrow menu    Giving    Alumni    College of Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering    Undergraduate    Student Organizations        Student Organizations  Seven student organizations might be of particular interest to students majoring in computer engineering, electrical engineering, and engineering physics. These groups are part of the larger constellation of UIC Engineering student organizations , which is designed to grow and change over time as new students create groups based on their special interests.      ECE-Related Student Organizations           American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics  Members design and build remote-controlled aircraft, high-powered rockets, and quad-copters.             Audio Engineering Society  Meet audio industry professionals and learn directly from recognized experts.             Engineering Design Team  Build robots for competition against other college teams from around the country             Engineering World Health  Unites ECE students with like-minded bioengineering majors  for the cause of global well-being.             Engineers Without Borders  Part of a national organization that aims to use engineering solutions for the betterment of communities worldwide.             Eta Kappa Nu  The international honor society of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).             Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers  A professional association dedicated to advancing technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humankind.             Vehicle Electronics and System Engineering  Build and race the electric cars of the future with this student organization.               College-wide student organizations  Visit our college-wide student organizations page for more information about other UIC College of Engineering student organizations, including interdisciplinary groups such as the National Association of Black Engineers, Society of Automotive Engineers, Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers, Society of Women Engineers, and Veterans in Engineering.
